sentence.Network_en: This article researches the types of error that occur when foreign students process the phonogram characters.

sentence.Network_en: Yanoda is a phonogram indicating one two and three in the Hainanese dialect.

sentence.Network_en: A phonogram refers to a Chinese character composed of a meaning element and a sound element.
